00021 
00022 #include "whiptk/whip_toolkit.h"
00023 #include "whiptk/w2d_class_factory.h"
00024 
00025 extern WT_File *whip_file; //Assume this has been opened for writing elsewhere.
00026 
00027 WT_Result FillPattern()
00028 {
00029     WT_W2D_Class_Factory cf;
00030 
00031     //Store the current fill pattern.
00032     WT_Fill_Pattern *previous_pattern = cf.Create_Fill_Pattern( whip_file->desired_rendition().fill_pattern() );
00033     if (previous_pattern == NULL)
00034         return WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00035     //Set the fill pattern.
00036     whip_file->desired_rendition().fill_pattern() = WT_Fill_Pattern::Slant_Left;
00037     //Set the pattern scale.
00038     whip_file->desired_rendition().fill_pattern().pattern_scale() = .75;
00039     //Create a filled drawable (e.g. a polygon).
00040     int x=0,y=0;
00041     WT_Logical_Point vP[4];
00042     vP[0] = WT_Logical_Point(x, y);
00043     vP[1] = WT_Logical_Point(x+100, y);
00044     vP[2] = WT_Logical_Point(x+100, y+100);
00045     vP[3] = WT_Logical_Point(x, y+100);
00046     WT_Polygon *pg1 = cf.Create_Polygon(4, vP, WD_True);
00047     if (pg1 == NULL)
00048         return WT_Result::Out_Of_Memory_Error;
00049     //Serialize it.
00050     WD_CHECK(pg1->serialize (*whip_file));
00051     cf.Destroy( pg1 );
00052     //Restore the previous pattern.
00053     whip_file->desired_rendition().fill_pattern() = *previous_pattern;
00054     cf.Destroy( previous_pattern );
00055     return WT_Result::Success;
00056 }
